privacy.description: Review DeliveryVN's policy on collection, use, and retention of personal information.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: DeliveryVN values your personal information and processes it securely in compliance with data protection laws.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect name, phone number, address, email, and may collect additional information required for payments.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Information
usage.content: We use collected information for service delivery, order processing, customer support, and service improvement.

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Information
sharing.content: We do not share personal data externally except minimal information required for delivery partners.

storage.title: 5. Data Retention
storage.content: We retain data while services are used and delete upon account deletion, except when required by law.

security.title: 6. Security Measures
security.content: We implement encryption, access restrictions, and security software to protect your data.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: You may request access, correction, deletion, restriction, and withdraw consent at any time.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We may use cookies and similar technologies; you can control them via browser settings.

location.title: 9. Location Information
location.content: We collect and use location information to provide delivery services with your consent.

children.title: 10. Children
children.content: For children under 14, we obtain guardian consent and apply additional protection measures.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Policy
changes.content: We notify reasons and details before changes; material changes may require additional consent.

contact.title: Contact for privacy inquiries
contact.description: For privacy policy inquiries or exercising your rights, contact us at:
contact.address: 123 Dong Khoi St., District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.description: EU residents may exercise additional rights under GDPR.

terms.description: Read the terms of using DeliveryVN services.

general.title: 1. General
general.content: These terms govern the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the company and users regarding the food delivery service provided by DeliveryVN.

service.title: 2. Service Provision
service.content: We provide online food ordering and delivery intermediation services and continuously strive to improve quality.

user.title: 3. User Obligations
user.content: Users must comply with these terms, provide accurate information, and use the services for legitimate purposes.

order.title: 4. Orders and Payments
order.content: An order is established upon payment. Cancellations and refunds follow each store's policy.

payment.title: 5. Payments and Fees
payment.content: Payments are processed through secure systems; delivery and service fees may apply.

delivery.title: 6. Delivery Service
delivery.content: Delivery times may vary by store conditions and may be delayed due to weather.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not directly responsible for food quality or store service and are only liable for intermediation.

intellectual.title: 8. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All intellectual property rights of content in the service belong to the company or respective owners.

termination.title: 9. Restriction of Use
termination.content: We may restrict service use or suspend accounts without notice in case of terms violations.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: These terms may be amended due to legal or policy changes; we will notify in advance.
